channel.title: scenario on Hyperfoil
channel.description: Recent content in scenario on Hyperfoil

item.title: Scenario
item.description: Scenario Scenario is a set of sequences. The sequence is a block of sequentially executed steps. Contrary to steps in a sequence the sequences within a scenario do not need to be executed sequentially. The scenario defines one or more initialSequences that are enabled from the beginning and other sequences that must be enabled by any of the previously executed sequences. To be more precise it is not the sequence that is enabled but a sequence instance as we can run a sequence multiple times in parallel (on different data).
